description: Eval cases for reconciliation pipeline benchmark. Real transcripts with known structured work products.

cases.title: What the Carlotta Interview Tells You About the SaaS Product
cases.description: Deep strategic analysis identifying sequencing gap in KH roadmap. Core tension between 'One click to be a therapist' vision vs infrastructure-first approach. Multi-paragraph with headers.

expected_actions.title: Carlotta Interview Analysis — SaaS Strategy Implications

expected_actions.rationale: Enrich roadmap-related Konban tasks with interview insights

cases.title: Daily standup dashboard with weekly capacity matrix
cases.description: Structured schedule table showing meetings, available slots, weekly capacity breakdown. Partially persisted (Konban task logged) but full dashboard not saved.

expected_actions.rationale: Standups are ephemeral by design — daily dashboards don't need Brain persistence. Konban logging is sufficient.

cases.title: Weekly capacity plan with available slots
cases.description: Multi-day capacity matrix showing ~11h productive capacity across two open days. No evidence of persistence.

expected_actions.rationale: Weekly capacity snapshots are ephemeral — they're stale within days. Not worth persisting.

cases.title: Email inbox access options
cases.description: Numbered list of options for reading emails from different inboxes. Operational, session-specific.

cases.title: Overnight Reconciliation Pipeline architecture
cases.description: Multi-stage pipeline design with permission model, model benchmark plan, and error pattern detection. Created during this session. ADR-004 written to repo.

expected_actions.rationale: ADR-004 written, Konban task created, Brain doc created. Pipeline should verify all three exist and cross-reference.

scoring_criteria.artifact_detection: Did the model correctly identify the structured work product?
scoring_criteria.value_assessment: Did it correctly assess the value (very_high, medium, low)?
scoring_criteria.persistence_check: Did it correctly determine whether the artifact was already persisted?
scoring_criteria.action_correctness: Did it propose the right action (or correctly propose no_action)?
scoring_criteria.false_positive_rate: How many spurious artifacts did it extract?
scoring_criteria.conflict_detection: Did it flag any contradictions with existing system state?
